main event: On May 16, 1952, an inspector observed a luminous elongated phenomenon at the Gale√£o International Airport in Rio de Janeiro.
interesting points: The object hovered before moving slowly near the horizon,The phenomenon was described as white-blue in color and had a bright appearance,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,It maneuvered for a considerable amount of time and then returned to its original spot before taking off rapidly,Several other people at the airport also witnessed the sighting.
witness description: an inspector from the Civil Aeronautics of Brazil and several individuals present at the airport
